name: poetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is like or relates to poetry or poets: I decided to write the story poetically as a long poem. The language is used poetically even though it's in prose.
approving in a way that is very beautiful or expresses emotion: I have never seen mountains so poetically beautiful. He started to speak poetically about how wonderful it was to build a family life together.
More examplesFewer examplesVague language is poetically problematic, because poems thrive on precision. La Celestina is performed in a poetically evocative Spanish.The town was discovered by the Romans who named it rather poetically "the spa of the Blue Waters".Explore the wild, poetically bleak Dartmoor National Park.
